knimeNode.name: SMARTS Query
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters molecules based on a SMARTS search

fullDescription.intro: Matches a list of molecules against a list of SMARTS patterns. Molecules that match at least one SMARTS pattern are included in the first output table. Molecules that match no SMARTS pattern are directed to the second output table. Stereochemistry is supported by default. If "Match Unique" is selected, a column with the unique count of matches is appended. If multiple SMARTS query strings are provided, the sum total is calculated.
fullDescription.option: Select the column that contains the molecules.
Select the column that contains the SMARTS strings (SMARTSCell type).
Appends a column with unique matches.

ports.inPort: Table that contains at least one column with CDK molecules.
Table that contains at least one column with SMARTS queries.
ports.outPort: Table with molecules that match at least one query.
Table with molecules that do not match any of the queries.
